title: A sacred memorie of the miracles wrought by our Lord and Sauiour Iesus Christ. Written by Samuel Rowlands
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Imprinted by Bernard Alsop, and are to be sold at his house by Saint Annes Church neere Aldersgate,
notes: Running title reads: A memory of Christs miracles.
